content_descriptors.notes:
Gynocracy is an adult erotic visual novel. It contains adult language, nudity, sexual themes, sexual situations, and some prominent BDSM elements.

In particular, it focuses heavily on themes of female domination (femdom) over men and women, both psychologically and sexually. As such, the game contains scenes involving chastity play, erotic humiliation, orgasm denial, use of restraints (bondage), spanking, cuckolding, and blackmail.
Some sexual acts are either non-consensual or involve questionable consent.

The game also occasionally depicts the use of alcohol and tobacco.

All characters in the game are over the age of 18.
